original: intros. intros H_val H_neq H_msg. unfold msg_spec in *. unfold post_msg. unfold content. unfold TaggedMessage in *. simpl in *. destruct H_msg as [H_msg1 H_msg2]. destruct H_msg1 as [i [t [c [H_find H_criterion]]]]. unfold msg_in_soup in H_criterion. split. + exists i, t, c. split. * apply findPtUniq with (i0:=i) in H_val. rewrite H_val. auto. * intros i' t' c' H_find'. apply H_criterion in H_find'. simpl in H_find'. rewrite H_find in H_find'. inversion H_find'. auto. + intros i' t' c' H_find'. apply H_criterion. rewrite <- H_find. apply findPtInv in H_find'. rewrite H_find' in H_find. inversion H_find. auto.
